content.question: An electoral system based on proportional representation is more likely than a system based on single member districts to encourage

choices.label: gridlock between the executive and legislative branches of government
weaker legislative representation of minority groups
the development of a political system dominated by the executive branch
the development of a multiparty system

content.answer: the development of a multiparty system

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
